id: Aesthetic Notion Budget Template and Subscription Tracker
name: Aesthetic Notion Budget Template and Subscription Tracker
description: Effortlessly Track Your Spendings With this Notion Budget Template.Keep track of your expenses and reach your financial goals with this simple and user-friendly budget template. View your expenses in a variety of ways and use filters to break down your spending by category. Get started today!This simple, user-friendly and aesthetic Notion Budget Template makes it easy to set a monthly cap for your spending and then enter all your expenses into the built-in database. features: Expense Tracker; Subscription Tracker; Expense Categories; Monthly Reports; Annual Reports
